          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'énergie du soleil est responçable du temps</string>
            <string language="en">Sun's energy causes all weather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie des Sonnen verursacht Allwetter-</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A energia do sun causa para qualquer tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'energia del sun causa per qualsiasi tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενέργεια του ήλιου προκαλεί όλο τον καιρό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía del sun causa para cualquier 
estación</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'énergie du soleil cause le vent, les vagues et la pluie.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the energy from the Sun causes wind, waves and rain.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">L'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">source d'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">energy source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pluie</string>
            <string language="en">rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vagues</string>
            <string language="en">Waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vent</string>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Energie von der 
Sonne Wind, Wellen und Regen verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia do sol 
causa o vento, as ondas e a chuva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia 
proveniente dal sole causa il vento, le onde e la pioggia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενέργεια από τον 
ήλιο προκαλεί τον αέρα, τα κύματα και τη βροχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía del sol
causa el viento, ondas y la lluvia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiequelle</string>
          </keyword>
